Package com.threerings.nexus.net

Interface Summary
Downstream A base interface for all messages received from a server.
Downstream.Handler Used to dispatch downstream messages.
Upstream A base interface for all messages sent to a server.
Upstream.Handler Used to dispatch upstream messages.
 

Class Summary
Connection Manages a connection to a particular server.
Downstream.DispatchEvent Notifies the client of an event originating from the server.
Downstream.ObjectCleared Delivers an object cleared notification from the server.
Downstream.ServiceFailure Delivers a failure response to a service call from the server.
Downstream.ServiceResponse Delivers a response to a service call from the server.
Downstream.Subscribe A successful response to a subscription request.
Downstream.SubscribeFailure A failure response to a subscription request.
Streamer_Downstream Handles the streaming of Downstream and/or nested classes.
Streamer_Downstream.DispatchEvent Handles the streaming of Downstream.DispatchEvent instances.
Streamer_Downstream.ObjectCleared Handles the streaming of Downstream.ObjectCleared instances.
Streamer_Downstream.ServiceFailure Handles the streaming of Downstream.ServiceFailure instances.
Streamer_Downstream.ServiceResponse Handles the streaming of Downstream.ServiceResponse instances.
Streamer_Downstream.Subscribe Handles the streaming of Downstream.Subscribe instances.
Streamer_Downstream.SubscribeFailure Handles the streaming of Downstream.SubscribeFailure instances.
Streamer_Upstream Handles the streaming of Upstream and/or nested classes.
Streamer_Upstream.PostEvent Handles the streaming of Upstream.PostEvent instances.
Streamer_Upstream.ServiceCall Handles the streaming of Upstream.ServiceCall instances.
Streamer_Upstream.Subscribe Handles the streaming of Upstream.Subscribe instances.
Streamer_Upstream.Unsubscribe Handles the streaming of Upstream.Unsubscribe instances.
Upstream.PostEvent A request to post an event on the server.
Upstream.ServiceCall A request to post a service call on the server.
Upstream.Subscribe A request to subscribe to a Nexus object.
Upstream.Unsubscribe
